scripts.test:fast: npm run test:frontend:fast && npm run test:backend:fast
scripts.test:full: npm run test:frontend:full && npm run test:backend:full
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:frontend:full && npm run test:backend:integration
scripts.test:frontend:full: cd frontend && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.test:backend:fast: cd backend && go fmt ./... && go vet ./... && go test -short ./...
